message:
Dears, If any one using Ionic2 i have problem with native google maps multiple markers described here 

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41112288/ionic2-native-map-multiple-markers
or 
https://forum.ionicframework.com/t/native-map-markers-problem/72844 

i searched a lot but all solutions uses pure javascript not typescript 
or Ionic-native classes. 
any help will be appreciated.
story: Mohammed Agwa shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Native map markers problem
caption: forum.ionicframework.com
description: Hey all, I'm trying to implement native google maps in my ionic 2 project but i get an error to set markers clickable. this is my code to draw markers: for (var i = 0; i < mapMarkers.length; i++) { var centerMarker = mapMarkers[i]; let location = new GoogleMapsLatLng(centerMarker.lat, centerMarker.l...

data.message:
اللي فهمته من SOF ان المشكلة اتحلت وان دا كان الحل .. عشان لو حد بيتابع يستفيد
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41099774/ionic-2-google-maps-marker-click-event
